All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AdamOptimizer
An Optimizer which updates parameters according to the vanilla optimization step: theta_i = theta_i - lr * theta.grad If enabled, this Optimizer will clip gradients to be within a specified range (to encourage numerical stability).

An Optimizer which updates parameters according to the vanilla optimization step: theta_i = theta_i - lr * theta.grad If enabled, this Optimizer will clip gradients to be within a specified range (to encourage numerical stability).
